name: Ferma
public_notice: Ferma has recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. For more information, please visit this post.

description.en: FERMA (https://fermasosedi.biz/) token is designed to use in the game on fermasosedi.biz (http://fermasosedi.biz/) to make deposits, withdrawals, buying advertisements and for use in some sections of the game.
